post:
Here you go friends! Another KVM deal:

http://www.ransomit.com.au/rock_wallaby_512mb_kvm_vps

Use the promo code YELLOWFOOT and choose to pay quarterly to get this at LEB pricing ($21 per quarter)

- You can do a traceroute/ping to 119.252.16.201 to check latency
- The servers are in Adelaide, South Australia
- We aren't backing these up: for this price you can do it yourself
- You get 1 IPv4 address
- You get 10 IPv6 addresses (more available on request)
- We own our servers

Specifications
- 512MB RAM
- Solus / KVM
- 2 CPU cores (Intel Xeon E3-1240v2)
- 6GB of disk space (10K SAS drives)
- 50GB of incoming data transfer
- 150GB of outgoing data transfer
- Shared 100mbit port
- A range of ISOs available for popular operating systems like CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, Gentoo, Fedora, Lucid Puppy, FreeBSD, Crux Linux and Scientific Linux. If you want another ISO added, just ask! :-)
